page.topic: UX Component - Hiding, Showing, Enabling, Disabling Buttons in a Button List Control
page.description: If your data has NULL values, you can now specify the text to show for the NULL values. For example, you might want to show n/a for null values.

section.description: You can use Javascript to dynamically hide, show, enable and disable buttons in a Button List control on a UX component. You can also dynamically add and remove buttons from the Button List. In this video we show the Javascript to dynamically alter the Button List.
